messages.message: Should we be changing our local virtual envs to run 3.9.15? I can run `make test` successfully in api-server even though my virtualenv still runs 3.7 after running the install steps outlined above

your local virtual env should stay on 3.7, as this is what the other services will run on. when you run `make test` from `api-server`, it will transparently build/use a new py39 virtual env just for this service
(over time weâ€™ll transition each service to run in its own venv, so they run with their own dependency versions, python versions, etc)

To demonstrate the impact of Lenny's upgrade work. Below is the memory profile for api-server on dogfood, and the section on the right that started around 9:00 am PST corresponds to the upgraded version :slightly_smiling_face: We expect this upgrade to bring us more memory stability in the py services
